name: stride-gpt (mrwadams)
description: [项目级] An AI-powered threat modeling tool that leverages OpenAI's GPT models to generate threat models for a given application based on the STRIDE methodology.。来源: https://github.com/mrwadams/stride-gpt

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
An AI-powered threat modeling tool that leverages OpenAI's GPT models to generate threat models for a given application based on the STRIDE methodology.

来源: https://github.com/mrwadams/stride-gpt
语言: Python
Stars: 982

genes.title: 项目结构

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Simple and user-friendly interface
- Generates threat models based on the STRIDE methodology
- **Agentic AI support**: Specialized threat modeling for agentic AI systems with OWASP Top 10 for Agentic Applications (ASI) integration
- **Generative AI support**: Threat modeling for GenAI applications with OWASP LLM Top 10 integration
- **Architectural pattern detection**: Automatically detects RAG pipelines, multi-agent systems, code execution environments, tool ecosystems, and more from application descriptions (inspired by [CSA MAESTRO](https://cloudsecurityalliance.org/blog/2025/02/06/agenti
